description: Patagonia's lightweight, backcountry-ready SnowDrifter Bibs combine stretchy fabric for uphill performance with serious storm protection to keep you dry and comfortable in all conditions. The SnowDrifter Bibs provide 3-layer H 2 No® Performance Standard protection in a 70% recycled stretch fabric that’s ideal for human-powered powder pursuits. Fair Trade Certified™ sewn.
name: Patagonia Snowdrifter Bibs - Mens
